body:
The Trilinos package contains the comment:

```
    # not everyone has py-numpy activated, keep it disabled by default to avoid
    # configure errors
    variant('python',       default=False, description='Build python wrappers')
```

Later, it specifies a dependency on `python`, but not on `py-numpy`. If Trilinos actually depends on `numpy` when Python is used, then it needs to say so in its dependencies.
title: numpy dependency problem in Trilinos
